statements: SELECT * FROM FaceRecognitionData LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, camera_id, timestamp FROM FaceRecognitionData WHERE camera_id = 1;
SELECT id, image_url FROM FaceRecognitionData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM FaceRecognitionData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM FaceRecognitionData;
SELECT id, camera_id, image_url, timestamp, recognition_result FROM FaceRecognitionData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM FaceRecognitionData WHERE camera_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT camera_id, image_url FROM FaceRecognitionData WHERE recognition_result ->> 'name' = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM FaceRecognitionData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_records, AVG(camera_id) AS avg_camera_id FROM FaceRecognitionData GROUP BY camera_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT camera_id, camera_name, location FROM iot_cameras;
SELECT * FROM iot_cameras WHERE camera_id = 1;
SELECT camera_name, location FROM iot_cameras ORDER BY camera_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM iot_cameras WHERE location LIKE 'Room%';
SELECT camera_id, camera_name FROM iot_cameras WHERE camera_id IN (2, 3);
SELECT camera_name, location FROM iot_cameras WHERE camera_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM facial_data WHERE detection_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT camera_id, detection_timestamp FROM facial_data ORDER BY detection_timestamp DESC;
SELECT camera_name, location, detection_timestamp FROM iot_cameras JOIN facial_data ON iot_cameras.camera_id = facial_data.camera_id WHERE detection_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM iot_cameras WHERE camera_name LIKE '%front%' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM facial_recognition_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, camera_id, timestamp FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE camera_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM camera_details WHERE location = 'Entrance';
SELECT owner_name, location FROM camera_details WHERE camera_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, camera_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT id, camera_id FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE camera_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM facial_recognition_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT fd.id, cd.location FROM facial_recognition_data fd JOIN camera_details cd ON fd.camera_id = cd.camera_id;
SELECT * FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE image_data IS NOT NULL AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ud.user_id, cd.owner_name FROM user_permissions ud JOIN camera_details cd ON ud.camera_id = cd.camera_id WHERE ud.permission_level > 1;
SELECT * FROM Camera;
SELECT location, resolution FROM Camera WHERE brand = 'Canon';
SELECT recognition_id, camera_id, person_id FROM Recognition ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Person WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT action, details FROM Log WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Camera;
SELECT camera_id, brand, location FROM Camera ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT * FROM Person WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT camera_id, location, brand FROM Camera WHERE location LIKE '%Building%';
SELECT p.name, r.timestamp, c.brand FROM Person p JOIN Recognition r ON p.person_id = r.person_id JOIN Camera c ON r.camera_id = c.camera_id ORDER BY r.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM CameraData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT camera_id, location FROM CameraData WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, email FROM UserData WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT recognition_id, timestamp, user_id FROM RecognitionData WHERE confidence > 0.8 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type FROM AlertData WHERE camera_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM CameraData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY camera_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT camera_id, location FROM CameraData WHERE location LIKE '%London%' ORDER BY camera_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM UserData WHERE first_name = 'John' OR last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT recognition_id, user_id, confidence FROM RecognitionData WHERE confidence > 0.9 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT access_id, user_id, camera_id, access_timestamp FROM AccessData WHERE access_timestamp < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY access_timestamp ASC LIMIT 20;
